ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That Day no one will punish as He punishes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: None can punish as He will punish on that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then on that Day Allah will chastise as none other can chastise;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day the punishment of God and His detention will be unparalleled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So on that day, no one punishes like He does!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So on that Day none will punish as He will punish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But on that day shall no one chastise with (anything like) His chastisement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon that day none shall chastise as He chastises,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: None punisheth as He will punish on that day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day no one will punish as He punishes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore on that Day none shall torment with His torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: On that day none shall punish as He punishes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For, that Day, His Chastisement will be such as none (else) can inflict,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So on that Day, none will punish as He will punish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But on that Day none will punish as He (Allah) will punish,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On that Day, none will punish as He punishes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:25] Then on that day none shall mete out (read yu‘adhdhibu) His, God’s, chastisement, that is to say, He shall not delegate it to any other;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (None punisheth as He will punish on that day) on the Day of Judgement!
